pets.name: invisible-pet
pets.desc: It's nothing! Absolutely nothing! For those that hate pets. Jerk.

pets.name: tank-icon
pets.desc: Your own personal tank! It's small, compact, and good for going right next to your URL! Notice: Only one tank per user, while supplies last.

pets.name: chompy
pets.desc: It's Chompy! These adorable lil guys have been friends of Linerians for ages! They are as soft as marshmellows and like to dress up as their best friends if they're around them long enough! They also like to... yanno, chomp! They only eat fruits, though!

pets.name: elephant-small
pets.desc: It's like an elephant, but small!

pets.name: elf-like-creature
pets.desc: This little Elf Like Creature (ELC) is festive. Okay? It's festive.

pets.name: angry-faic
pets.desc: What are you looking at? >:(

pets.name: cool-frog
pets.desc:
That's one cool frog!

Note: Cool Frog does not like bullies so do not say anything mean to him.

pets.name: sushi-cat
pets.desc: Always starving, this cat needs their sushi!

pets.name: swf
pets.desc: It's an SWF! These guys contain so many different worlds in them. What could this one have?

pets.name: swf-blammed
pets.desc: Oh... This SWF doesn't look too good...

pets.name: rammy
pets.desc: This adorable ram will hit you really hard! Not here, though. Here they're just adorable!

pets.name: carrion-bird
pets.desc: It may be a pigeon covered in soot, but this loyal bird follows Captain Carrion wherever they go.

pets.name: and-me
pets.desc: The only child Dad won't chainsaw. Instead, it's family bonding for the whole family!

pets.name: persimmon-innocence
pets.desc: The object of innocence, untainted by the cruel world. Bring it with you and show it the reality.

pets.name: clubby-the-seal
pets.desc: Not to be confused with that other seal clubbing game.

pets.name: lemmy
pets.desc: A friend with benefits, always willing to lend a helping hand (or several.)

pets.name: wreath-of-wrath
pets.desc: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

pets.name: tamago-pet
pets.desc:
Proof of encountering a rare tamago, in a tiny lovable adorably anxious package!
Note: Tankmas is not responsible for damages caused by prolonged exposure to the Tamago.

pets.name: shmigmar
pets.desc: Shmigmar loves his wife, Swiishii, very much. We need can aspire to be more like Shmigmar.

pets.name: pet-box
pets.desc: Yea that's a box alright.

pets.name: penicorn
pets.desc: Don't worry about it.

pets.name: gooble
pets.desc: Gooble loves you. Convert to gooblism for eternal happiness and safety.

pets.name: shmigmar
pets.desc: Duty calls those who answer the duty. For some, we get heroes, for the fortunate, we get Shmigmar.

pets.name: peanutbudder
pets.desc: It's budder than ever!
